headline: Nucor and Other Steel Stocks Soar. How Tariffs Can Help Earnings.
summary: Nucor  and other steel stocks rose in Monday trading, helped by a Wall Street broker’s more “constructive view” of the sector.  UBS analyst Andrew Jones said in a Monday report that American steel stocks that he follows are down more than 15% from mid-December levels despite President Donald Trump’s trade protections.  Benchmark steel prices  shot up from roughly $750 a ton to $900 a ton after the tariffs were announced.

headline: Nucor, Steel Dynamics upgraded by UBS on tariff protections
summary: UBS upgraded Nucor (NUE) and Steel Dynamics (STLD) to Buy from Neutral, citing stronger tariff protections for US steel and aluminum. Market Domination anchors Josh Lipton and Julie Hyman discuss the potential impacts of unpredictable US trade policy and future steel price trends. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Here's Why UBS Analysts Are Bullish on American Steel Stocks
summary: UBS analysts on Monday upgraded the shares of several U.S. steelmakers, citing Trump's "tariff support."

raw.headline: Here's Why UBS Analysts Are Bullish on American Steel Stocks
raw.summary: UBS analysts on Monday upgraded the shares of several U.S. steelmakers, citing Trump's "tariff support."

headline: UBS upgrades Nucor, Steel Dynamics on tariff support and higher price outlook
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded Nucor (NYSE:NUE) and Steel Dynamics (NASDAQ:STLD) to Buy and maintained a Neutral rating on Commercial Metals Company (NYSE:CMC), citing increased U.S. steel trade protections and higher price forecasts. UBS raised its price targets to $160 for Nucor and $149 for Steel Dynamics, while maintaining a $49 target for CMC.
